profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I focus on building high-performance back-end solutions using **Node.js**, **PostgreSQL**, and **AWS**. My strong expertise in **GraphQL** and **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** ensures the delivery of scalable and maintainable applications. I possess advanced analytical skills and problem-solving abilities that enable me to tackle complex backend challenges effectively.
I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms, implementing robust microservices architectures while ensuring compliance with industry standards. My experience extends to mentoring junior developers and fostering collaboration within teams, which enhances overall productivity and innovation. I also have a solid foundation in building secure applications and integrating machine learning pipelines into backend systems, utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** for a seamless development process.
